name: Age of Amperes
description:
Escape / Space / R brings up a pause menu to return to the main menu.

An electronic circuit puzzler!  Direct electrons around circuits of increasing complexity, with a variety of tricky components to work with.  Your goal — power the light bulbs in each level.  

Featuring 15 levels to get those neurons firing!

A game by Josh Haxell and Sammy El-Bahrawy

Made with these excellent tools: 

C Stoquer's Pixelbox.js

schteppe's p2.js
